column1: insert cord of leaf clip into mini PAM
connect fiber optic cable into miniPAM and handheld leaf clip
Ensure that the distance between the end of the fiber optic cable and the leaf clip does not move between measurements
clamp onto mature leaf (7-15 leaves down from the apical bud) on South side of tree and measure.
record yield number and ETR number
Can flag measured leaf for ease of re-measuring
